client.apis.v1.tests.test_is_phone_valid 源代码

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
"""
@Summary : 测试手机号是否可用
@Author  : Rey
@Time    : 2022-03-23 16:23:34
@Run     : python manage.py test client.apis.v1.tests.test_is_phone_valid  -v=3 --keepdb
"""
from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.test import APITestCase

from client.apis.v1.tests.base import create_user



[文档]class TestIsPhoneValid(APITestCase):
    """测试手机号是否可用: UserPhoneExistsAPIView.get"""
    databases = {'default', 'credible_data'}


[文档]    def setUp(self) -> None:
        """初始化数据"""
        self.user = create_user(phone='18458148500')



[文档]    def client_request(self, phone: str):
        """封装请求

        :param str phone: 手机号
        :return resp: 
        """
        url = '/api/v1/scf/client/phone/is_valid/'
        data = {
            'phone': phone,
        }
        return self.client.get(path=url, data=data, format='json')




[文档]    def test_valid(self):
        """测试手机号可用"""
        resp = self.client_request('18458148501')
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertTrue(resp_json['data']['is_valid'])

    

[文档]    def test_fake_phone(self):
        """测试输入非手机号格式"""
        resp = self.client_request('abdcds')
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST)
        self.assertIn('手机号不合法', resp_json['msg'])

    

[文档]    def test_invalid(self):
        """测试手机号已存在, 不可用"""
        resp = self.client_request('18458148500')
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertFalse(resp_json['data']['is_valid'])



[文档]    def test_no_phone(self):
        """测试未输入手机号"""
        url = '/api/v1/scf/client/phone/is_valid/'
        resp = self.client.get(path=url)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST)
        self.assertIn('手机号不合法', resp_json['msg'])
